title: [Client] New Skin Pics
body:
http://i.imgur.com/RvM8WDs.png)

Not sure if this is really a bug, but I'm sure it a problem of sorts.

replies.body:
they just came out 
there is no bug
the blood moon skins just came out

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E5jwVoE8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-08T20:40:55.216+0000)

That isn't what he or she is referring to. The picture is both of Blood Moon Elise, but one of them says Blood Moon Thresh.

oh my bad sorry
yea there is a bug with the thresh picture
riot just released it so it will probably be fixed soon
There's no bug, Thresh just finally got the Visual Update he needed.

Are you guys still seeing this? 

I just checked, and it looks okay to me now.
